item.title: lei - a Go installer
item.description: A CLI tool to help install Go, written in Go! or that’s what I wanted to create! lexicon word: lei, language: Manipuri, noun 1. flower Whenever a new version of Go is released I have to download the tarball, extract it and replace the current installation. Usually I typed some commands in the command line to accomplish the task. I could use a shell script to accomplish it. There are already some tools which can install Go and even manage different versions and installations.
